content: रेचक {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (चिका|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [रेचयति रिच्णिच् ण्वुल्] {@--1@} Emptying, purging. {@--2@} Purgative, aperient. {@--3@} Emptying the lungs, emitting the breath. --कः {@--1@} Emission of breath, breathing out, exhalation, especially through one of the nostrils (<ab>opp.</ab> पूरक which means ‘inhaling breath’, and कुंभक ‘suspending breath’). {@--2@} A syringe. {@--3@} Nitre, salt-petre. --कं A purgative, cathartic.
